title: Ngai teh vawiin van Lal Fapa
lyrics:
Ngai teh, vawiin van Lal Fapa,
A ropuina ram pelin;
Bethlehem dai bawng in tlawmah,
A lo piang chun riang chawiin.

A ngur lo piang par ang an lawm,
Lal lai thangsel run lianah;
Van Lal lo piang tunge lo lawm,
Bethlehem bawng in tlawmah?

A tan hliaptu bawng in tlawm zar,
Laikhum zalna ran thlengah;
A rawn lawmtu chhingkhuala mi,
A chawitu chun riang Mari

Aw, chu lawmna leh an hlimna,
Khawvel min an hmuhsit chu;
Khawvel lal tin piang zawng aiin,
Kei ka tan lung tilawmtu.

Aw, hmangaihna a va na em!
Hrehawm tuar, inngaitlawmin;
Mihring chun leh zua rawn belin,
Van Lal, khawvel sual tlantu.
